bibl.title: The Language of the Papyri.
bibl.note: Versions of most of the chapters were presented at the conference 'Buried Linguistic Treasure: The Potential of Papyri and Related Sources for the Study of Greek and Latin' held at Christ Church, Oxford from 30 June to 2 July 2006. - Pp. v-vi: Tr.V.E. and D.D.O., Preface; - 1-12: Tr.V.E. and D.D.O., Introduction; - 313-334: Bibliography; - 335-362: Index.
EVANS Trevor V. and Dirk D. OBBINK (Edd.), The Language of the Papyri.
Oxford, Oxford University Press, 2010, 8°, xxii-362 pp., tabl., figg. ISBN 978-0-19-923708-1. £65.
